featured.text: Tim: Someone left a schoolbag on the bus.
One week after the typhoon, some bridges were finally opened and bus service _____ in the country’s most severely damaged areas.
Do you know what time the next bus is ______?
The townspeople built a _____ in memory of the brave teacher who sacrificed her life to save her students from a burning bus.
The bus driver often complains about chewing gum found under passenger seats because it is and very hard to remove.

other.text: I am tired of to school in a crowded bus every day.

definition.zh_def: 一種公共交通工具，通常在固定路線上運行，能夠載運多名乘客。
definition.en_def: A large vehicle that carries passengers by road, typically along a fixed route.
definition.example: I took the bus to work this morning.
